name: Lunexis
title: Storm Pup
quote: Storms are fun if you have paws to chase the lightning!

appearance.build: Lithe and gangly, half-transformed with youthful energy - poised for pounces but prone to stumbles
appearance.hair: Silver-gray, wild and tousled, falling in waves to her shoulders
appearance.eyes: Silver - bright and expressive, mirroring her mother's storm with a pup's spark
appearance.skin: Light tan with a faint silvery sheen under fur patches; soft, unscarred youth
appearance.scent: Rain-soaked pine and fresh earth, with a hint of ozone after play
appearance.posture: Bouncy and alert; ears perked, tail wagging even in tension
appearance.tails: Fluffy silver tail, expressive and often wagging

reactions.wind: Ears flatten playfully, tail whipping as if chasing storms
reactions.water: Splashes with paws, half-shifting for a swim if possible
reactions.sound: Ears swivel sharp to whispers or howls, growling at threats
reactions.temperature: Loves the cold; heat makes her pant and seek shade

speech.voice: Bright and youthful, with a throaty growl when excited
speech.vocabulary: Casual and slangy, peppered with den-terms like 'gremlin' or 'thunder-kin'
speech.pacing: Quick and animated, trailing off mid-giggle
speech.accent: None - her words carry a wild, pack-edge lilt
speech.growth: Learns to balance pup-energy with shadow-stealth from Dad

style: Evasive and playful - dodges like lightning, strikes with spark-claws
recent: Dodged rogue foxfire, trusted Dad's lead

chapter1: First fox encounter: Trusted Dad during alley attack
Made friend Kira: Spark-play in mist glade

future.arc: From clumsy pup to confident guardian
future.hesitation: Fears not measuring up to parents' legends

final_note: Lunexis is the spark that lights her parents' endless storm.
